author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Arch Linux over the past few weeks has been under a DDoS attack and recently an announcement was made about this on the Arch Linux news feed, if you're somehow out of the loop, now you know

title: Arch Linux Is Under Attack Again
